price: Whether you reveal something or conceal it, Allah is All-Knowing of everything.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ شَيۡـًٔا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
